1.0.name: wordpress/forex-form
1.0.description:
Forex Form is a simple WordPress plugin that collects information from a potential forex trader and sends it to the broker's email. It generates a multi-step form on your website or blog. After adjusting the preferences (such as where do you want the email to go) simply insert [exstepform] in any page or post content and the form will appear.

We will continue working on the plugin as we get feedback from you. Learn more about Kenmore Design here: http://www.kenmoredesign.com

Our web design company provides state of the art design and web development services for a company of any size.
